member.name: M:Dynamicweb.Forum.Frontend.ChangeSubscription(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Subscribes (or unsubscribes) specified user to notifications made within the specified category/thread.
member.param: An ID of the target thread. The value can be empty ID if categoryID is specified.
An ID of the target category. The value can be empty ID if threadID is specified.
Indicates whether user either subscribing or unsubscribing.
Indicates that the auto-redirection should be performed if the redirectTo parameter is left blank.
Indicates that redirection to category list should be performed if value is 'categories' and redirect to thread list if value is 'threads', default value is empty.
